about.summary: Creates 'HTML' strings to embed tables, images or graphs in pop-ups of interactive maps created with packages like 'leaflet' or 'mapview'. Handles local images located on the file system or via remote URL. Handles graphs created  with 'lattice' or 'ggplot2' as well as interactive plots created with 'htmlwidgets'.

name: r-leafpop
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.0.1' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-leafpop
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/leafpop_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/leafpop/leafpop_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c8ebf7beddc683cace34c437fc935ddca74d4752b527f80b3faea7071c598aad

build:
  number: 2
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  script: R CMD INSTALL --build .
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}  # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}  # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}  # [win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}  # [win]
    - {{posix}}filesystem  # [win]
    - {{posix}}make
    - {{posix}}sed  # [win]
    - {{posix}}coreutils  # [win]
    - {{posix}}zip  # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcpp >=1.0.0
    - r-base64enc
    - r-brew
    - r-gdalutils
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-svglite
    - r-uuid
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{native}}gcc-libs  # [win]
    - r-rcpp >=1.0.0
    - r-base64enc
    - r-brew
    - r-gdalutils
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-svglite
    - r-uuid

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('leafpop')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('leafpop')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=leafpop
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Creates 'HTML' strings to embed tables, images or graphs in pop-ups of interactive
    maps created with packages like 'leaflet' or 'mapview'. Handles local images located
    on the file system or via remote URL. Handles graphs created  with 'lattice' or
    'ggplot2' as well as interactive plots created with 'htmlwidgets'.
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
